text: The 84th Givati Brigade () is an Israel Defense Forces infantry brigade formed in 1947. The Brigade is divided into three battalions with each battalion having its own commander. ==Related pages== * Golani Brigade * Al-Qassam Brigades * 2021 Israelâ€“Palestine crisis ==References== Category:1947 establishments in Asia Category:1940s establishments in Israel Category:Israel Defense Forces Category:Military units in West Asia Category:Military units in the Levant Category:Militant groups Category:Violence Category:Nationalist violence Category:Religious violence Category:Political violence
